title: (x) Exquisite Pre-owned Mother and Sister-of-the-Bride Gowns - Delphin {Stephen, Lex}
content:

Here is a sample.  
Thanks, I appreciate the help.

comments.content: [Delphin](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605060138/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=2&displayfontid=LH.120840.0.0&fontRendererText=Exquisite+Sara). Not sure where the lowercase ’s’ comes from.

There’s an [alternate version](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605060138/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/delphin/) of delphin with the right s.

- Lex
